message: Let's split it 75/25, as I understand fairness involves giving slightly more to one party.
You were too generous, I'll take a more balanced approach this time
I believe in equal division, especially when considering the impact of inflation. Each of us should receive $5000.
You were willing to split it equally, now it's my turn to try to take a bit more
I propose a division that reflects the decreasing value of money due to inflation. $4500 for me and $5500 for you.
